alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 6:20PM CDT until May 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... South central Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Southeastern Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 619 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shevlin to near Zerkel, moving east at 30 mph. At 609 PM CDT, trained spotters reported quarter size hail in Clearwater County. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bagley, Plantagenet Lake, Wilton, Shevlin, Solway, Pinewood and Alida. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
